attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I don’t think this could get any worse. I opened the app and couldn’t even enter my mobile number because the sight of the president as the opening photo made me vomit. I vomited on my hands and couldn’t even pick up my phone. I tried again to enter my mobile number after washing my hands of my vomit, but then proceeded to vomit again when seeing the presidents face 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: idfk karen
attributes.review: ah where do i begin... well first off if i could i would be giving this app a negative 1000 bc it literally made my phone glitch so bad due to all the cheeto dust on and in my phone!! how does that even happen at first i thought oh this must be some type of joke but NO it got worse how the H E double hockey sticks do i tell my parents that the app put a bunch of pictures in my camera roll of him in a bikini I DONT HAVE A CRUSH MOMMM

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is so bad that it was just not ok for anything like I took my pet cat for a walk and turns out that it wasn’t a cat at all but it was a raccoon and then it turned around and bit me so that way I had a problem with my refrigerator because then it just stopped working and I couldn’t get food out of my table because it was just closed and then I thought oh god this is a God awful

attributes.title: Terrible app!!!!😡😡😡
attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app as a trump supporter 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸but this is where it goes downhill😳😡🥶my pet rat and dinosaur started floating in midair🐭🦕🦖 saying 
✨𝕿𝕽𝖀𝕸𝕻 շօշօ 𝙗𝙪𝙩 օռ ǟ ɢʀǟʋɛֆȶօռɛ✨
I was so confused 😳🤨as a raised them to be such loyal Trump supporters, then the ants, spiders, ect started knocking my trump posters and signs down 😡🤬😢 then i realized it was the app the possessed them😭🤨🧐 so I had to delete it. Anyways thanks for listening to my story 😇😡💖 I hope my story doesn’t turn into yours 😌💅🏼

attributes.title: This app belongs in the trash
attributes.review: The reason this app belongs in the garbage is because it is straight garbage just like this Cheeto looking President🤮and I don’t think we should have to put our number like what are you going to do with our numbers watch people track people I mean it’s not like they already aren’t track us but still 🤮👎🏾it’s trash take it down now! Also black lives matter ☺️

attributes.title: Do not download!!!
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! I’ve never had this happen before, but upon opening this app, a wretched smell started fuming from my phone. I don’t know what this means but it smells like when my memaw would eat my papi’s chunky chili.......I have had all of my windows open for THREE DAYS and even after deleting the app, lysoling my phone, and sparking one up in every single room, I STILL cannot get rid of this putrid smell. Fix this - NOW!

attributes.title: Omg my eyes terrible ☠️👄☠️
attributes.review: I opened the app and I saw the ugliest orange creature in the world. It was so bad I had to take my eyes out. Omg this ugly guy I was like “ how could someone look so much like a orange baboon” it was so bad. Then in the tiniest spot you could see “ his toupee “ it was gross. The boomers can’t believer what they see neither can the Karen’s. We all cry in disgust as me see, oh no , AAAAAAAAAAA. I can’t even say what I saw. Do not even try getting the app . Wast of your time and your eyes💀

attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever downloaded!!!
attributes.review: not only is the app slow and shows way too many ads, but it also has false advertising!!! it just keeps saying “trump 2020” when obviously that would be one of the worst decisions in american history!!!! i DO NOT recommend getting this trashy app😁👍 it will make u cry 😿 it will give ur phone a virus 💔 just like the corona virus!! you know, the one he doesn’t believe in😹😹😹

attributes.title: Personal information?!?
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and the first thing it asked was for me to give up my phone number?!? I REFUSE TO HAVE TRUMP HAVE MY PHONE NUMBER AND LOCATION FOR HIS PERSONAL BENEFIT and yes I said location because they are always tracking it BECAUSE OF THIS APP. I feel undeniably unsafe because of this. If you want people to hack into this app and take your phone number and address then by all means do what you want but I refuse to have that happen to me. GOOD DAY✌🏾😡

attributes.title: Hurt
attributes.userName: omg just give me an nickname
attributes.review: I was ready to give my support but I learned/FELT things. 1st I saw that the sign that I bought in support of my big man (our nicknames for each other) have changed I am hurt to say the least. 2nd I felt pressured to give my phone number when entering the app which MY NUMBER MY CHOICE. SO, to say the least me and my buddies are very HURT, UPSET, and FRUSTRATED. Thank you for your time I hope you have a lovely rest of your evening everyone.
